item.title: 英国石油公司软化 2030 年石油减产基调以安抚投资者
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）软化了其削减 2030 年石油和天然气产量承诺的措辞，以努力让投资者对其能源转型战略放心，并缩小与竞争对手之间巨大的价值差距。【原文：BP softened the language on its pledge to cut its 2030 oil and gas output in an effort to reassure investors over its energy transition strategy and narrow a gaping value gap with rivals.】

item.title: 西门子能源上调业绩展望，标榜陷入困境的风电部门更换首席执行官
item.description: 西门子能源公司（Siemens Energy）周三表示，将在不到三年后更换陷入困境的风力涡轮机部门的老板，并上调了本年度的业绩展望，这主要得益于其电网业务。【原文：Siemens Energy will replace the boss of its troubled wind turbine division after less than three years, the company said on Wednesday, also raising its outlook for the current year primarily on the back of its power grid business.】

item.title: 美国考虑将越南提升至 "市场经济 "地位
item.description: 本周三，美国商务部将就是否指定越南为 "市场经济国家 "听取证词，届时美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）拉拢越南成为战略盟友的努力将与他争取工会工人选票的愿望发生正面冲突。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden's bid to draw Vietnam closer as a strategic ally will clash head-on with his desire for union workers' votes on Wednesday as the Commerce Department hears testimony on whether to designate Vietnam as a "market economy".】

item.title: 丰田第四季度营业利润大增 78
item.description: 丰田汽车公司周三公布，受日元疲软和销售稳健的提振，第四季度营业利润增长约 78%，达到 1.11 万亿日元（72 亿美元）。【原文：Toyota Motor on Wednesday posted a roughly 78% rise in fourth-quarter operating profit at 1.11 trillion yen ($7.2 billion) boosted by a weak yen and solid sales.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将美联储降息预期从 7 月推至 9 月
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）表示，目前预计美国联邦储备委员会将从 9 月份开始降息，而之前的预测是 7 月份，同时预计全年将继续降息三次，每次 25 个基点。【原文：Morgan Stanley said it now expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to start lowering interest rates from September, compared to its earlier forecast of July, while continuing to see three 25-basis-point rate cuts through the year.】

item.title: 早间竞标思考美联储的政策路径
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 人工智能热潮将推动今年亚洲的数据中心交易
item.description: 随着人工智能（AI）的蓬勃发展刺激了对数字基础设施的需求，全球私募股权投资者和资产管理公司正准备对亚太地区的数据中心进行价值数十亿美元的并购和投资。【原文：Global private equity investors and asset managers are readying for billions of dollars worth of M&A and investments linked to data centres in Asia Pacific, as the artificial intelligence (AI) boom fuels demand for digital infrastructure.】

item.title: KKR 将以 14 亿美元收购 Perpetual 的企业和财富管理部门；首席执行官 Adams 将退休
item.description: Perpetual 周三表示，收购巨头 KKR & Co 将以 21.8 亿澳元（14.3 亿美元）的价格收购其财富管理和企业信托业务，这使得这家澳大利亚金融服务公司的股价跌至五个月来的最低点。【原文：Perpetual said on Wednesday that buyout giant KKR & Co would acquire its wealth management and corporate trust businesses for A$2.18 billion ($1.43 billion), sending the Australian financial services firm's shares to a five-month low.】

item.title: 亚洲股市漂移，美元坚挺，美联储加息路径引人深思
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市缺乏方向，尽管美国国债收益率下降，但美元依然坚挺，因为市场评估了美国决策者和经济数据对美联储利率走向发出的好坏参半的信号。【原文：Asian stocks lacked direction on Wednesday, while the dollar remained firm despite lower U.S. Treasury yields as markets assessed mixed signals from U.S. policymakers and economic data on the path for Federal Reserve interest rates.】

item.title: 日元苦苦挣扎，美元重拾升势
item.description: 周三，美元重拾升势，在早些时候因美联储今年降息的押注重燃而遭受损失后小幅上扬，而日元则向 1 美元兑 155 日元的水平回落，并使来自东京的干预风险居高不下。【原文：The dollar was back on the front foot on Wednesday, making modest gains after earlier losses from renewed bets on Federal Reserve rate cuts this year, while the yen eased towards the 155 per dollar level and kept intervention risks from Tokyo high.】

item.title: 据中国国家媒体报道，特斯拉拟在中国推出机器人轴
item.description: 据《中国日报》周三援引未具名消息人士的话报道，特斯拉已提议在中国推出机器人轴。【原文：Tesla has proposed to launch robotaxis in China, newspaper China Daily reported on Wednesday, citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: 聚焦：通过现场检查，中国加强了对本地市场 IPO 候选者的审查
item.description: 据 10 位消息人士透露，中国监管机构正在审查旧的商业交易，甚至是高级管理人员的个人银行账户，同时加强对希望首次公开募股企业的检查，以减缓新的资本募集步伐，促进二级市场的发展。【原文：Chinese regulators are scrutinising old business deals and even the personal bank accounts of senior executives as they ramp up inspections of IPO hopefuls to slow the pace of fresh capital raisings and boost secondary markets, according to 10 sources.】

item.title: 油价因美国库存增加而走低
item.description: 市场消息人士称，美国石油学会的数据显示美国原油和燃料库存增加，表明需求疲软，油价在周三亚洲早盘交易时段下跌。【原文：Oil prices fell in early Asian trading hours on Wednesday after market sources said that data from the American Petroleum Institute showed an increase in U.S. crude and fuel stockpiles, an indicator of weak demand.】

item.title: 日本央行上田表示，如果日元走势影响通胀，有可能采取政策行动
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫周三表示，如果日元走势对通胀产生重大影响，央行可能会采取货币政策行动。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said on Wednesday the central bank may take monetary policy action if yen moves have a big impact on inflation, escalating his warning against the economic fallout from the currency's recent sharp declines.】

item.title: 波音 "星际客机 "太空舱计划于 5 月 17 日进行首次载人试飞
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）周二表示，为更换助推火箭上的一个压力阀，波音公司的 "星际客机 "太空舱首次载人试飞的下一次发射目标日期已被推迟到不早于5月17日。【原文：The target date for the next attempt to launch Boeing Co's Starliner space capsule on its first crewed test flight has been pushed back to no earlier than May 17, to replace a pressure valve on its booster rocket, NASA said on Tuesday.】

item.title: FTX 提交修订后的重组计划，预计将分配 145 亿至 163 亿美元的资金
item.description: 根据加密货币交易所 FTX 周二向美国一家破产法院提交的修订重组计划，该公司将有 145 亿至 163 亿美元用于支付债权人和客户。【原文：Crypto exchange FTX will have between $14.5 billion to $16.3 billion to pay its creditors and customers, according to an amended reorganization plan filed by the company on Tuesday in a U.S. bankruptcy court.】

item.title: 巴西家乐福第一季度扭亏为盈
item.description: 由法国家乐福控股的巴西家乐福第一季度净利润为 3900 万雷亚尔（约合 770 万美元），扭转了去年同期的亏损局面，原因是食品通胀率的上升扩大了利润。【原文：Carrefour Brasil, which is controlled by France's Carrefour , reported a net profit of 39 million reais ($7.7 million) for the first quarter, reversing losses in the same period last year, as higher food inflation expanded its profits.】

item.title: Panera Bread 将逐步淘汰 "Charged Sips "咖啡因饮料
item.description: 快餐连锁店 Panera Bread 的发言人周二表示，该公司正在逐步淘汰含咖啡因饮料系列 "Charged Sips"。【原文：Fast-food chain Panera Bread is phasing out "Charged Sips", its line of caffeinated drinks, a company spokesperson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 零售商法拉贝拉因秘鲁业务实现第一季度盈利
item.description: 智利零售商法拉贝拉（Falabella）周二公布第一季度净利润，扭转了去年同期的亏损局面。【原文：Chilean retailer Falabella on Tuesday posted a net profit for the first quarter, reversing a year-ago loss, boosted by operations in Peru.】

item.title: 美国立法者寻求加强确保航空公司快速退款的法案
item.description: 美国众议院和参议院的谈判代表已同意修改航空改革法案中的措辞，以确保航班被取消且未找到替代航班的航空公司乘客能迅速获得退款。【原文：U.S. House and Senate negotiators have agreed to revise language in an aviation reform bill to ensure quick refunds for airline passengers whose flights are canceled and who are not seeking alternative flights.】

item.title: 早间竞价：看涨势头减弱，日元干预风险上升
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国政府为何要调查波音 787 Dreamliner？
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周一表示，已开始对波音787梦想飞机进行调查，以查明是否有员工声称某些未进行的测试已经完成，从而犯下了 "不当行为"。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said on Monday it has opened an investigation into the Boeing 787 Dreamliner to see whether some employees committed "misconduct" by claiming certain tests that were not performed had been completed.】

item.title: Levi Strauss 结束对意大利 Brunello Cucinelli 商标标签的诉讼
item.description: Levi Strauss 指控意大利奢侈时装品牌 Brunello Cucinelli 侵犯其熟悉的矩形口袋商标的诉讼已经结束。【原文：Levi Strauss has ended its lawsuit accusing the Italian luxury fashion brand Brunello Cucinelli of infringing its familiar, trademarked rectangular pocket tab.】

item.title: 惠誉下调纽约社区银行评级至 "BB
item.description: 惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周二将陷入困境的地区性贷款机构纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）及其银行子公司旗星银行（Flagstar Bank）的评级从 "BB+"下调至 "BB"。【原文：Fitch Ratings on Tuesday downgraded embattled regional lender New York Community Bancorp and its bank subsidiary, Flagstar Bank, to 'BB' from 'BB+'.】

item.title: 永利度假村澳门业务强劲，季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 永利度假村（Wynn Resorts）周二公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是博彩业、奢侈品零售业和酒店预订量的增长推动了澳门物业的稳定需求。【原文：Wynn Resorts on Tuesday beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit as strength in gaming, luxury retail and hotel bookings drove steady demand at its Macau properties.】

item.title: 破产的 Steward Health 出售旗下医院，披露 90 亿美元债务
item.description: 破产企业 Steward Health Care 的律师周二在休斯顿举行的法庭听证会上表示，Steward Health Care 已将其在美国的 31 家医院全部出售，希望在夏季结束前完成交易，以解决其 90 亿美元的负债总额问题。【原文：Bankrupt Steward Health Care has put all of its 31 U.S. hospitals up for sale, hoping to finalize transactions by the end of the summer to address its $9 billion in total liabilities, its attorneys said at a Tuesday court hearing in Houston.】

item.title: 约会应用支出下降，Match Group 预计季度收入低于预期
item.description: Tinder 的母公司 Match Group 周二预测第二季度营收将低于华尔街预期，因为用户可能会减少在约会应用上的消费。【原文：Tinder-parent Match Group forecast second-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as users are likely to dial back spending on dating apps.】

item.title: Rivian 坚持年度产量预期，季度亏损扩大
item.description: 电动汽车制造商 Rivian 周二重申了其 2024 年的产量预期，但仍远低于分析师的预期，因为该公司在上个月停产后正集中精力重启生产，以升级装配线并降低成本。 Rivian第一季度亏损扩大，盘后交易股价下跌约2%。【原文：Electric-vehicle maker Rivian on Tuesday reiterated its 2024 production forecast, keeping it well below analysts' expectations, as it focuses on restarting production after a shutdown last month to upgrade its assembly line and reduce costs. Shares of Rivian, which reported a wider first-quarter loss, were down about 2% in after-hours trading.】

item.title: Reddit 收入超过预期
item.description: Reddit 周二发布了作为上市公司的首份财报，凭借强劲的用户增长和广告市场的回暖，季度营收超过预期。【原文：Reddit beat quarterly revenue estimates on Tuesday in its first earnings as a public company, riding on strong user growth and an uptick in the advertising market.】

item.title: 随着打车需求回升，Lyft 预计季度盈利强劲
item.description: 受服务需求强劲以及新用户和司机功能带来的好处推动，打车公司 Lyft 周二预计，本季度的总预订量和核心利润将高于预期。【原文：Ride-hailing company Lyft projected higher-than-expected gross bookings and core profit for the current quarter on Tuesday, driven by robust demand for its services and benefits from new user and driver features.】
